data.enText: caring only about yourself rather than about other people
Do you think I'm being selfish by not letting her go?
data.chText: 你觉得我不让她走是自私吗？

data.enText: What a selfish thing to do!
It was selfish of him to leave all the work to you.
data.chText: 他把所有的工作都推给你，真是自私。

data.enText: She looked forward, a little selfishly, to a weekend away from her family.
data.chText: 她有点自私，就盼着能够离家在外边度个周末。

tr: concerned chiefly or only with yourself and your advantage to the exclusion of others
example: Selfish men were...trying to make capital for themselves out of the sacred cause of civil rights"- Maria Weston Chapma

example.ex: I think I've been very selfish. I've been mainly concerned with myself.
example.tran: 我觉得我一直非常自私。总是只关心自己。

example.ex: ...the selfish interests of a few people.

value.def: If you say that someone is selfish, you mean that he or she cares only about himself or herself, and not about other people.

example.ex: Cabinet Ministers are selfishly pursuing their own vested interests.
example.tran: 内阁大臣们正在自私地追逐他们自己的既得利益。

example.ex: The arrogance and selfishness of different interest groups never ceases to amaze me.
example.tran: 不同利益集团的傲慢和自私总是会让我大吃一惊。

partsOfSpeech.dec: fin 结束,范围 + -ish 像...一样
di- 二者之间 + stingu- 刺,刺激 + -ish 像...一样
flour n.谷物粉 + -ish 像...一样
ex- 出,出去 + sting- 刺,刺激 + -u- + -ish 像...一样
per- 完全,贯穿 + -ish 像...一样
